thread.title: BRIEF-Ares Capital Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.57

title: BRIEF-Ares Capital Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.57
text:
May 2, 2018 / 12:13 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Ares Capital Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.57 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Ares Capital Corp: * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.57
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR Q1 OF 2018, ARES CAPITAL REPORTED GAAP NET INCOME OF $242 MILLION OR $0.57 PER SHARE * FOR Q1CO REPORTED CORE EPS OF $0.39 PER SHARE
* FOR Q1 OF 2018, ARES CAPITAL REPORTED NET INVESTMENT INCOME OF $144 MILLION OR $0.34 PER SHARE
* ARES CAPITAL - FOR Q1, CO REPORTED NET REALIZED AND UNREALIZED GAINS OF $98 MILLION OR $0.23 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
